Product-Design

BeautyEyes, an Eye Skin Care Product Design

November 15, 2025 15 min read
TOC
  • Research
  • Design
  • Renderings
  • Prototyping
  • Finally

Hello everyone, I’d like to introduce the BeautyEyes project. This project is a company-supported project. A Korean company, MIMETICS, collaborated with our group, the Immersive Design Group in the School of Design at SUSTech. In this project, I mainly focus on product and structure design.

Currently, I have compiled some images, and I will add explanations in the future.

Research

We created the mood board and conducted an interview that focused on the target users’ needs.

Design

Here I show part of my sketches, and during the design process, we positively used 3D printing for real testing.

Renderings

Here I show part of my renderings.

Prototyping

There are some details of our prototype.

Finally

This is our final prototype. It works well. Thanks to my friends for letting me take such nice pictures of their usage process.
